name: WOWz.io
description:
Size 25Mb
Ram 1Gb

Multiplayer 10/Room
server EU

Day by day as many as possible.

#Control MOVE : WASD
ATTACK : MOUSE
Bag : Key : B
 Tool : Key : 1-9

Collect all the tools and weapons that may help you build. Crafting: Food, Weapons, Shelter Use your survival skills to stay alive. Survival tools - Hunting with an ax A useful survival tool such as an ax. Now you have to fight and fight for your life if you want to survive!
